definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[רעם]] ( √ of foll., prob. onomatop.; Gerber:47 prop. move violently as orig. meaning, but ref. to thunderous sound everywhere, exc. Ez Eze 27:35 where text dub., v. infr.; cf. Aram. [[רַעַם]], [[רְעִים]] n. thunder, [[רְעֵם]] vb. thunder; esp. Aph. Ithpa. utter (loud) complaints; r9em, ra9mo0 n. thunder, r9em vb. thunder, lament, cf. NH [[רָעַם]] Hiph. thunder, Hithp. complain; Eth. ra9am:: n. thunder, As. rîmu, id.; Ar. ragima vex, dislike, etc.).
